DOC.brief_summary: An investigational drug (MK0677) will be studied to determine whether it helps the memory and cognition of patients with Alzheimer's Disease.
DOC.brief_title: Study of MK0677 for the Treatment of Alzheimer's Disease (0677-030)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Patients must have probable Alzheimer's disease of mild or moderate severity. A brain scan and laboratory results must be consistent with Alzheimer's disease. The patient must be otherwise medically healthy.
